strategy_reasoning: Using the 'garden shed' metaphor aligns perfectly with the 'new tool' update while maintaining the cozy, organic brand identity. It translates a dry technical update (Dev_Tools addition) into a warm, inviting visual narrative.
visual_style: Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic with soft lighting, chunky sprites, and prominent lime green (#ecf874) accents. Reminiscent of Stardew Valley interiors and gardens.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene inside a rustic garden tool shed. The cute bee mascot (Polly) with pink blush and blue wings is hovering next to a workbench, hanging a new glowing pixelated wrench on a pegboard. Sunlight streams through a dusty window. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and warm cream background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font on the wall: 'DEV TOOLS'. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients.
images.description: Polly adding the new GeneXus tool to the collection in the shed.

images.prompt: Chunky pixel art of a cute robot with a CRT monitor head examining a floating code block that glows lime green (#ecf874). The robot's screen eyes look excited. The bee mascot (Polly) wears a tiny welding mask pushed up on her head, watching the robot. Soft pastel lavender and mint gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi 8-bit aesthetic, Stardew Valley vibes. Text in pixel font: 'GENEXUS'. Cozy pixel art, retro gaming vibes.
images.description: The Robot companion analyzing the new integration.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the round tan nomnom creature happily eating a stack of pixelated instruction manuals. Speech bubble: 'NOMNOM' in pixel font. The bee mascot (Polly) is tending to a lime green (#ecf874) code-plant in a pot nearby. Soft pastel peach and cream gradient background. Large visible pixels, lo-fi 8-bit aesthetic, warm lighting, cozy vibes like A Short Hike. Nostalgic but beautiful.
images.description: Nomnom consuming the documentation for the new tool.

caption:
New tool in the shed. üõ†Ô∏è

Just merged a PR adding GeneXus AI to our Dev_Tools collection. We like keeping the workbench stocked for whatever you're building next.

Whether you're generating code, assets, or just messing around, the infrastructure is open and ready. Grab your API key (or don't, the free tier is fine) and go make something weird.

Link in bio to the repo.

#pollinations #opensource #genexus #devtools #pixelart #indiedev #buildinpublic #creativecoding #aiart #lowcode
alt_text: Pixel art carousel: 1. A bee hanging a tool in a garden shed. 2. A robot with a monitor head scanning a glowing code block. 3. A round creature eating instruction manuals while a bee tends to a plant.
